transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ma'am, good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Numan bol raha tha ma'am IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haanji Numan. Mereko awaaz pehchani pehchani lag rahi thi. Maine kaha number different hai, ye kaun hai?
Executive: Nahi, actual mein woh aapne na, uh, kya kehte hain, video meeting ki request open kari thi.
Customer: Toh...
Executive: Achha ji.
Customer: Toh kab woh usi ke liye maine call kiya tha ki aap bataiye kis time kar lein phir isse.
Executive: Aap mereko paanch minute do. Main papa ne request kari hai na, toh main unse time leke main aapko update karti hoon.
Executive: Theek hai ma'am, theek hai.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Following up on a video meeting request.
- Needs to schedule a time for the meeting.


Resolution:

- Customer will confirm the meeting time with her father.
- Will update the executive with a suitable time.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Customer will call back after confirming the time with her father.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- video meeting, scheduling, follow-up
